SEARCH

Uses of Class
model.game.Entity

Packages that use Entity
Package
Description
controller.controllers
Package containing controller classes related to Controllers, that create, manage, update and draw their own related objects.
model.enemies
Package containing model classes related to Enemies, entities that can lower your life points when they hit you.
model.player
Package containing model classes related to Player, the entity you can controll to move, jump and shoot bubbles.

  • Uses of Entity in controller.controllers

    Methods in controller.controllers with parameters of type Entity
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    AnimationController.setAnimation(Entity entity)
    Updates animation stats for an enemy.
    default void
    AnimationController.updateAnimation(Entity entity, int maxAniIndex)
    Updates animation index, wich will be used to select proper animation image in animations BufferedImage arrays for every entity.

    Description

    Class to create and manage Enemies.
    class 
    EnemyBoss
    Class for enemy kind BOSS, similar to Enemy Mighta but can't be trapped in a bubble and his life points decreases every time a bubble hits him.
    class

    Class for enemy kind INVADER, see class enemy for general behaviour.
    class 
    EnemyMighta
    Class for enemy kind INVADER, unlike other enemies it floats in air.

    Class for enemy kind ZEN, standard enemy behaviour
